item.title: An Introduction to CI/CD with Python
item.description: Useful Links GitLab CI GitLab CI Sample Code Test and deploy a Python application with GitLab CI/CD Using GitLab CI/CD with a GitHub repository GitLab CI Documentation Travis CI Travis CI Sample Code Travis CI DPL - can be used with GitLab CI as well! Travis CI Documentation
